Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with delivery and product
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I ordered a refurbished Dell Laptop computer and was very happy with the quality of the laptop but also with the very short delivery time. It arrived in perfect condition like new with preloaded software, even more than I anticipated, in only 2 days! I wasn't expecting it before 3-5 business days. I definitely would recommend this seller and will use them myself again.

Reviews.Title: Too Bad
Reviews.Author: B. Renner
Reviews.Content: It was unfortunate but the computer had problems from day one.  It had a small window that came up every time the system was booted for no apparent reason, couldn't find me, fan made noise, and other issues.  It appeared to be a good computer and fast, couldn 't keep it because of problems.  Ordinarily Amazon has provided me with great products every time.  Computer has been returned and my money was refunded.

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: PaaKo Ridge
Reviews.Content: Excellently priced refurbished laptop with plenty of RAM, HD and Win7. Connects easily to internet wirelessly. Meets my needs for lightweight, highly functional laptop.

Reviews.Title: for the Dell Latitude D620
Reviews.Author: bruce masteller
Reviews.Content: i recomend this product to anyone wanting an excellent lap top. has same quality as new.is not slow and ponderous like my former computer. startup is very fast and since i began using this unit i have had no unit crashes or related problems as with my former equipment.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: Mommeeee
Reviews.Content: We bought this refurbished laptop for our 10 year old son for Christmas.  The seller had great feedback guaranteeing super service.  My husband and I unpacked it, it worked for about 5 minutes.  The battery was completely dead.  I located a local vendor on Christmas eve so my son could have a working laptop on Christmas day -- paid $100 for the battery and that worked for a few minutes.  Researched online to find out this laptop works best w/Dell battery.  I called the company that sold us this piece of junk, explained the problem and was asked, "what do you want us to do about it?"  Nice service, huh?  She then proceeded to tell me she would transfer me to tech service and hung up on me.  I will be returning it.  Not great service at all!!!  Avoid them like the plague!

Reviews.Title: Crashed three months after purchase
Reviews.Author: Thrifty "Shopper"
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed in this refurbished lap top, it crashed a few months after purchase.  I'll never buy refurbished again.  It's the second one that crashed.

Reviews.Title: Surprised
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: I was surprised by this .. it is my first Laptop and i was'nt expecting much for the price but the Laptop is Loaded and has lots of outputs . has wireless card..

Reviews.Title: Does what I need
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Pyles
Reviews.Content: Needed a 32-bit windows-7 PC to run some out-of-date software. This does what I need and haven't had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: why android?
Reviews.Author: Tom F.
Reviews.Content: why does anyone buy these android devices? Every product has 10-20% horror stories with big regrets. I can't find one device with consumer satisfaction.  What's wrong with this industry?  device works at first but don't expect it to last. What is that all about? Have people really become this stupid?

Reviews.Title: This is a great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: imfoxymama49
Reviews.Content: This is the second laptop I have ordered from this company (Tampa-laptops).  It came packaged very well and came with everything I would have gotten, if I had purchased it brand new.  I had a couple of little scratches but does not harm the quality of the laptop.  I saved alot of money and can afford to replace it down the road when they all become outdated again.  Great for kids and adults.  I highly recommend Tampa-Laptops.com  to purchase and save on refurbished laptops.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mary H.
Reviews.Content: My sister-in-law wanted a small laptop with Windows 7. This was the perfect solution for her. She loves it and it works very well.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: Mary Sandoval
Reviews.Content: It came quicker than expected. It looks  brand new and works wonderfully. I am so much happier with this one than the brand new HP I replaced it with.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and reliable
Reviews.Author: cementmason
Reviews.Content: My computing needs are quite simple, I like to surf the web and I research something almost everyday. I pay my bills online and buy almost everything online. With that said I don't need the latest and greatest and a pile of software. This computer does everything I want at 182.00 delivered to the house. It is fast and does all the things the new ones do. I will feel it is a good investment if I get a year out of it, anything more is a bonus. I will come back later to review this as more time passes but right now I have had it about 2 months and am well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: terrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did not receive the installation disk, and the company refuses to send it to me.  They said it was not included - when it clearly states it is.  Do not purchase anything from these people!

Reviews.Title: computer overheats & the battery only lasy about 30 minutes or less when not connected to power socket
Reviews.Author: Griselda Silva
Reviews.Content: I'm am very unhappy with this laptops Battery life, i believe this computer has a battery and this should have been disclosed to me the Seller. If the computer is not plugged into a power socket the battery will only last about 30 minutes.If the had scratches or if the battery was bad and the computer over heats, this should have all been Disclosed to the Buyer (Me)I would appreciate it if you could please contact the seller and let them know I'm very unhappy about the misrepresentation of the computer i bought, Im sure these defects were apparent to the seller but ignored so computer could sell anyway.

Reviews.Title: Ideal
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Really ideal home computer,especially set-up in a dock with a big monitor.good value @ a great price. Stillo using after 2 years.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: Does everything it should and looks brand new. A little heavy but it is to be expected with an older model laptop.

Reviews.Title: like new and nessary paper work included
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "m.m."
Reviews.Content: this company is a man of his word . refurbished and nessary paper work attached. runs like a new one  . PERFECT. keep up your professional  work.

Reviews.Title: Dell 32-Bit computer
Reviews.Author: Ruth Thompson
Reviews.Content: I like the computer because it serves my purpose. I did not like that the computer looked rather new in the photo and when I received an old and dingy computer I was bit surprise but it does work.

Reviews.Title: Great dealer
Reviews.Author: Richard Piazza
Reviews.Content: There service is the best, by far.Product is better than expected.I wish I knew them a long time ago.
